select jp_sos.sos_seq, jp_sos.sos_time, jp_location.latitude, jp_location.longitude, jp_member.mem_name, jp_member.mem_tel, jp_member.mem_guardian_tel, jp_member.jp_num from jp_sos, jp_location, jp_member where jp_member.mem_id = jp_location.mem_id and jp_location.jp_loc_seq = jp_sos.jp_loc_seq

select jp_location.jp_loc_seq, jp_location.latitude, jp_location.longitude, jp_member.mem_name, jp_member.mem_tel, jp_member.mem_guardian_tel, jp_member.jp_num from jp_member, jp_location where jp_member.mem_id = jp_location.mem_id AND jp_member.mem_id= #{mem_id}
